title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: A Training Program for Educational Software Development Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Enhanced ability to apply learning theories for educational software requirements analysis

Learners can develop a mobile-optimized medical/nursing education app prototype within four weeks, meeting the following criteria: 1) applying three or more UX design principles, 2) implementing three core features (quizzes, video lectures, learning progress tracking), and 3) achieving over 80% usability ratings from five target learners (nurses aged 40+).
Strengthened decision-making capabilities balancing educational effectiveness and technical feasibility

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
